articles.description: Kate Middleton joined a range of experts specialising in early childhood development, who have been appointed to give her advice on her work in the field, for a special meeting at Windsor Castle today
articles.content:
The Princess of Wales looked ready for business as she joined a special meeting today that focussed on her work with young children.

articles.title: Celtic stars spotted enjoying night out at Lewis Capaldi's Glasgow gig - Daily Record

articles.content:
